attributes.action: Make Banks Automatically Pay Back Bank Charges, without the customer having to rake through old statements!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make it so that the banks have to re-pay unlawful bank charges automatically, from the date the account was opened, so that the customer doesn't have to trawl through all the old bank statements and write numerous letters to them and have to take them to court, after all, they are in the wrong!
